meta.dc:title: Rule XXVIII (Reserved)
meta.property: §1104. Former rule on public debt limit.

note.p: The rule “Statutory Limit on Public Debt” was repealed in the 112th Congress (sec. 2(d)(2), H. Res. 5, Jan. 5, 2011, p. __). For its text and history, see §1104 of the House Rules and Manual for the 111th Congress (H. Doc. 110–162).
